DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effect two medicine COPD ( Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ) . This study last 18 week , subject visit clinic 5 time . Subjects give breathe test , record breathing symptom daily diary card .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Of GW815SF For Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( Chronic Bronchitis , Emphysema )
DOC.detailed_description: Clinical Evaluation GW815SF Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( Chronic Bronchitis , Emphysema ) `` Assessment Effect Addition Fluticasone Dipropionate Salmeterol Xinafoate 50µg Switching Double-blinded condition GW815SF 50/250µg Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis COPD . Exclusion criterion : Diagnosis asthma uncontrolled medical condition respiratory disorder COPD . Other inclusion exclusion criterion evaluate first study visit .
